snippet: Matt Fraser scored at 1 minute 19 seconds of overtime to give visiting Boston a 1-0 victory over Montreal, tying their Eastern Conference semifinal series at two games each.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Boston Bruins defeat Montreal Canadiens, 1-0, to tie their Eastern Conference semifinal series at two games each; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Matt Fraser scored at 1 minute 19 seconds of overtime to give visiting Boston a 1-0 victory over Montreal, tying their Eastern Conference semifinal series at two games each.
